fields.description:
The "controller" attribute in the <Alloy> tag would indicate that the view markup should not be processed as a runtime controller. The primary reason for this would be if the view was just the target of an <Include> element.

{code:xml}
<Alloy controller="false">
    <!-- the rest of your markup to be included -->
</Alloy>
{code}

If "controller" is not defined in the <Alloy> element, then "true" is the default and the view is processed as usual.
